title: MyParcel.com Carrier API Specification
description:
**Introduction**
This is the carrier API reference for MyParcel.com implementing the [OpenApi 2.0 specification](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md) according to [JSON API](http://jsonapi.org) conventions.
For more information visit our [API documentation](https://docs.myparcel.com).
**Units**
Some attributes in the API have values in one of the following units:
Currencycents/pence where applicable (eg. EUR, GBP, USD), otherwise the basic unit (eg. JPY, NOK)
Distancesmeters
Dimensionsmillimeters
Volumesliters (dm3)
Weightsgrams
